definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: What to do with these outcasts was one of the great problems of eighteenth-century England.
sentences.chinese: 對這些流民怎麼辦是十八世紀英國的嚴重問題之一。

sentences.english: The immigrants moved into the mountain area in northeast of Guangdong province and had regional difference.
sentences.chinese: 流民進入粵東北山區具有地區性的差異。

sentences.english: The refugee be accounted for twenty-six thousand of households, annual rent of three hundred thousand seedlings.
sentences.chinese: 流民歸佔者二萬六千戶，歲出苗租三十萬。

sentences.english: So, Flower-Drum performance became a main means using of finding food or begging money.
sentences.chinese: 花鼓表演成爲流民覓食乞錢的手段之一。

sentences.english: All of the following are Class features of the Knave .
sentences.chinese: 以下所有的都是流民的角色特徵。

sentences.english: Refugee is always one of factors that result in convulsions.
sentences.chinese: 流民始終是引發社會動盪的因素之一。

definition: able-bodied man (capable of fighting in a war)
